name: Rise and Dice
description:
Death is only the beginning to gambling addiction.

How to play:

  1. Click on a grave to start a level
  2. Click a die to roll it and try to get 5 dice connected.
  3. When you get enough score to raise the skeleton you win the level!

Top left level is the easiest while bottom right is the hardest.

Made by Henuli and Spazi
Sound effects sampled from Sonniss GDC game audio. Ending song by Kenney.

Source in GitHub
